title: 100: Accessing the Akashic Records with Daniela Gil
itunes:title: 100: Accessing the Akashic Records with Daniela Gil
description:
Wondering what the Akashic Records even are? The Akashic Records are essentially a dimension where all possibilities exist—all that ever could be.

By tapping in, you receive guidance from ascended masters (who are more like energies, rather than formerly incarnated human-beings) from a broader perspective.

I was trained to become an Akashic Record Practitioner by Daniela after this episode and am so excited to share her wisdom with you.

We discuss:
-What the Akashic Records even are
-How to tap in
-Daniela does a live channeling of the ascended masters from the Akashic plane
-How the Akashic Records is the dimension where all possibilities exist
-My experience being trained by Daniela Gil as an Akashic Records Practitioner

Be part of a community that supports you discovering your dharma in Rose Gold Goddesses, the sacred sisterhood collective with community, content, creativity and so much more — learn more about rosegoldgoddesses.com.

Check out SpendidSpoon.com/Sahara for $25 off your order, nationwide.

Intro + Outro Music: Silent Ganges by Maneesh de Moor

Discover your Dosha and receive custom results for your mind and body with my free quiz at eatfeelfresh.com/new-quiz

Connect with me for daily Ayurvedic and modern spiritual wisdom at: Instagram.com/iamsahararose
Facebook.com/iamsahararose Twitter.com/iamsahararose

Order My Books Eat Feel Fresh + Idiot's Guide to Ayurveda: https://www.iamsahararose.com/books
